feed.title: Wyrd Engine
feed.subtitle: Development blog and showcase for the Wyrd Engine

entry.title: Introducing the Gallery
entry.summary: In order to pull all the old material together into a single location, a new tab has been added to the blog called ‘Gallery’. As part of this new page, the first section added is called ‘Legacy Media’. The plan is to capture all the old screenshots, gifs and videos that were taken during the initial development. Granted there aren’t a huge amount as the project wasn’t planned to go much furth...

entry.title: Current Status
entry.summary: As this blog has been setup after the project began, I figured the best thing to do would be give an overview of whats happening, and how far along we have gotten. So the project started about 2 year ago as a way to playing around with a bunch of open-source libraries. The goal really was all around learning. Development was VERY slow due to only spending time on the project around work hours ...
